Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than $100 to you. Considering the high demand and limited availability, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to purchase the product for $125. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value we place on providing our esteemed customers with the best possible experience. I'm confident that you'll find this investment worthwhile. Let me know if you're interested in securing this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
